title: Gold Miners Topping Pattern Looks To Be Breaking Support
text:
VanEck Vectors Gold Miners ETF

This chart of Senior Gold Miners (NYSE: ) from Marketsmith.com shows that it could be forming a head-and-shoulders topping pattern over the past couple of months.

This pattern could be about to send the gold miners a rather bearish message. What would it take for this to happen?

The first step would be a break of steep rising support at (1), which so far looks to be taking place.

The next step to confirm that a bearish pattern is in the making would be a break of “neckline” support, which is being tested this week at (1).

What GDX (NYSE: ) does this week at the neckline will go a long way to proving that an important topping pattern is in play.
description: Stocks Analysis by Chris Kimble covering: VanEck Vectors Gold Miners ETF. Read Chris Kimble's latest article on Investing.com
